website_summaries.verdict: This award-winning makeup remover is also a hydrating face cleanser that leaves skin smooth and refreshed.
pros: The gentle papaya enzyme exfoliants help melt off makeup, even waterproof mascara
Nice scent of lime, bergamot and orange
Stays solid until applied, then lathers up, so it's perfect for travel
cons: A few users felt that the balm left a film on the skin

customer_reviews.title: My skin loves this product! Great cleaner and skin conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I have psoriasis, plus I undergo chemo once a week. This product calms my skin and keeps it looking fabulous in spite of my problems. I use it every night, even when I haven’t worn makeup that day! It’s a great alternative to soap - much less drying and just as effective in removing makeup and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough!! This makeup remover easily takes off even the toughest to remove makeup. It also helps moisturize your skin! You can even use it to remove eye makeup and it won’t bother your eyes at all if you accidentally get some in them. I originally got this in a boxycharm box and loved it so much I decided it was worth full price!
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: Cleans off all mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I am new(ish) to double cleansing and I have already tried a couple different oil cleansers. This is by far my favorite. It is magic! I let it sit for a couple of minutes before gently massaging in completely and then adding water. It is the only cleanser I have ever found that removes all of my mascara. I do follow up with another, very gentle face wash afterwards. I have used Moringa and Heimish and they do nothing compared to this. I had a ton of makeup (makeover) on last night and this took all of it right off! I can't imagine I'll bother buying any other oil cleanser. Also, a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Fives

customer_reviews.title: The best at removing makeup
customer_reviews.text: Was using another oil cleanser that was OK but came across buzz on this and I will never go back. Though I could get a deeper clean with a washcloth and this product I dont bother. Why? Because this works so dang good on its own its not necessary! Makeup literally melts away with little effort and your skin somehow manages to be soft without being greasy when youre done. Ive been using a few months now and no breakouts or changes in my skin. Just easy as heck cleaning power. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sunisshining17

customer_reviews.title: Not for mascara
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would easily remove mascara. I don’t use waterproof mascara but I have a hard time getting it all off. Unfortunately this product is not helpful at all! It’s a really lovely consistency and mild scent and it does well taking off foundation and concealer. But it gets in your eyes and simply doesn’t remove mascara. It’s cheaper to grab a bottle of jojoba oil and swipe it on your lashes with a microfiber cloth. Much more effective than this cleanser. I’m bummed - I really wanted to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Movies4life

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for waterproof mascara.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I wear Dior show waterproof mascara. This melts off with Green clean. It only takes a very small amount. Definitely will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Salopek

customer_reviews.title: I love the product, but looks rough.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a year or so now and I love it. It's my favorite balm to remove all of my make up. This is the first time that I get it from Amazon though, and it was all melted and misshapen to the point where it almost looked like there was less product in the tub than there should have been. Maybe I'm just picky. I'll probably just get it locally from Sephora next time. Hopefully, this COVID situation dies down by then.
customer_reviews.author: Sass

customer_reviews.title: You need this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best make up melter! I have extremely acne prone skin. Everything clogs my pores or breaks me out. This product has been amazing at causing no issues. It removes my makeup like a dream! Leaves no residue. Removes a full face of make including lash glue. Way better than that Crap Clinique “take the day off” that product caused me to breakout. HIGHLY RECOMMEND The Farmacy makeup remover!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Not Farmacy Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Not reviewing on the product alone, I absolutely love this cleansing balm and have been using it for years. Very gentle, gets everything off and doesn’t break me out. Just a warning, this is a reseller and not actually sold from Farmacy Beauty. It doesn’t seem that they’re selling fake products but please beware of old or expired products. The Farmacy Beauty team was able to look up my lot number and it came back as June 2019. They have a shelf life of about 36 months so not expired, just not fresh. Not a huge deal in my case, it’s not expired, but be careful with resellers!
customer_reviews.author: Drew A

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome!!! I’ve used many diff brands of makeup remover even too if the line. This removes every trace of makeup and leaves your akin so smooth! If you are oily it may not work as good, but I am dry especially in my cheeks and I LOVE IT!!! Just do not put it on your eyes for eye makeup remover. It has a little almost minty-ness to it so not good for the eyes. Don’t ask me how I know that! 😬
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, practically life changing. If like me you’re lazy at night and lay in bed wondering if it’s really so bad to sleep in your makeup... it is. And this makes you want to get up and wash your face. It literally melts away makeup and gives your skin a good cleanse as well. It also takes very little product to cleanse your whole face every night, and doesn’t leave your skin dry or tight. Works well with any follow up moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup remover.
customer_reviews.text: This makeup remover is amazing, I will never buy a different product. Previously, with remover wipes I would still have left over makeup on my face after washing it and with this remover I never have to take more makeup off after washing. The consistency takes a little getting used to because it does feel very oily but I’ve never used a product that works so well. You really get what you pay for and I wouldn’t let the price deter you from trying this. I find that it also lasts me much longer than makeup wipes. Overall I am more than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Love how it makes my skin feel
customer_reviews.text: I love how this product makes my skin feel. I have very dry skin and when I used this, it felt so refreshed and smooth. I thought it would dry up after a few minutes like other makeup removers, but it actually left my skin feeling nice and moisturized for a long time. I know it’s labeled as a makeup remover, but I’m tempted to use it as a daily cleanser because of how it makes my skin feel smooth and dewy. You know that feeling of how your skin looks and feels so good right after cleansing and moisturizing using a full, multi-product method? Well, that’s how I felt after using this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST gentle Mascara remover!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this is so creamy and moisturizing. I have really dry mature skin. I love how it warms up on the face as you rub it in with your fingers. Nice and gentle on the eyes. I rub it all over my eyes first to remove my mascara. Works on both waterproof and regular mascara. Then use it again all over my face and neck. It is the best formula I've ever used. I then tone and spray my face with hydration water. The difference in my skin is improving everyday I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Feels great , never dries
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I've ever used that I like better than plain warm water to wash my face. Feels great never dries.
customer_reviews.author: clrly reading

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Got it for her to speed up her makeup removal process and she’s hooked. She spends way less time trying to remove her makeup especially eye makeup. If you have lash extensions, I would recommend you keep this product away from the eye area. Otherwise it works like a charm to remove makeup and leave the skin feeling soft and supple. Another plus is that a little goes a long way so you need only a pea-size.
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying a removing balm and I have to say, I like it! I was using coconut oil but even after a double cleanse my face was still greasy and it made it hard to apply my skin products I love this product ! It smells amazing and I love that it has a little scoop to get the product out of the container. My only complaint is that it doesn’t remove all of my eye makeup. It is very moisturizing and my skin feels great after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this make up remover. I do believe they could go a little more natural on the ingredients but its safer than a lot of crap out there. All you have to use is a little bit and it goes a long way. It takes makeup off without scrubbing hard at all. It does leave a little fog in your eyes but you just rinse and you are fine. Love this product, worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: BugsMamae

customer_reviews.title: My everyday routine
customer_reviews.text: I never knew there was something out on the market that was so simple, so clean, so moisturizing, that would literally melt away your makeup yet leave your skin feeling good. Until I tried Green Clean! It's now my go to face routine.
customer_reviews.author: LisaD129

customer_reviews.title: Melts away makeup
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my green clean. This is the best cleaner for your face as it literally melts away all of the makeup. If you have a heavy amount on you may have to do it twice but a small amount goes so far that it’s totally fine. Worth every penny if you wear makeup
customer_reviews.author: melody smith

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup remover EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this stuff!! I dissolves makeup and grease out of my pores like magic! It smells lovely and leaves my skin feeling hydrated and clean. I am obsessed!! Please don't ever stop making this!
customer_reviews.author: 904_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Melts my makeup away!
customer_reviews.text: It smells great (like citrus and mint), melts on the skin, dissolving my make up, and rinses off cleanly. I use it with a Makeup Eraser cloth, also purchased on amazon. Only con is that the included spatula is a bit too big and scoops too much product. I switched to a smaller one from a face cream and it’s a perfect pea sized amount.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I use it every night, it replaced just taking off eye make up with coconut oil. I use this all over my face and wipe it off with a warm washcloth. Makes my skin clean and moisturized and ready for night time face cream. If you're considering using this product, go buy a couple six packs of wash cloths, the ticket is using a clean one every night as part of your bedtime routine. I'll never go back to just removing mascara with coconut oil again.
customer_reviews.author: g.wub

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Well, I ordered the make up remover and got the Sleep tight firming night balm instead. I will try this product. The balm seems nice, and will like it I’m sure. However, I really needed and wanted the remover. I will order from the company for the future products. To be fair, I did not reach out to the company for replacing item.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Healthy for skin
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it seems to work very well for me. I use a toner afterwards and the cotton balls come back clean so it doesn't seem to be leaving anything behind and it doesn't irritate my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Kattee

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good, feels amazing on my skin and really does melt onto your face. Really good for removing eye makeup. I only use this in the shower because if I use it to wash my face at the sink or with a wet towel it doesn’t completely wash out of my eyes and leaves me with blurry vision for a while. Otherwise highly recommend and will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: This product was first recommended to me by Sephora. Amazon sells it for a much better price. It does tend to go quickly though. It does a great job of removing face makeup with no residue left on towels
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Removes that mascara & eyeliner flawlessly!
customer_reviews.text: Highly impressed with this product! It removes foundation, mascara & eyeliner great! I've ALWAYS had leftover mascara & eyeliner residue with other "eye makeup removers" but this stuff really breaks it down! After I massage it in, I wipe it all off with a wet washcloth. Then I was my face with my regular cleanser. My skin is so soft & clean after. A little pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Savy B

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I order this product after having received a sample from Sephora. I was delighted to see it offered on Amazon. It works great. I will order the bigger size next time. The makeup just wipes off. Like the fact it is natural as well. I am going to look at this company's other products
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Peck

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons but best results skin wise
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Best balm I've tried. Skin improved significantly but I cant justify the price. Not crazy about the use of plastics in it but honestly I'm not sure of its impact on health or the environment as it seems the type used is in much debate. As a beauty product though, its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: ciennakay

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This balm is a staple in my night routine. It's one of the only makeup removers I use because I buy products that are vegan/cruelty free. It also works well despite having oily/combination skin, sensitive skin and acne prone. I was stressing out about the fact that I wouldn't be able to get it in time, but it showed up faster than it would've if I purchased online at Sephora due to the delays with quarantine. Very happy that I got it in time, and didn't have to deal with the aftermath of acne!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Nov

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has made my skin amazing. I use it and then wash it off and then use my regular face cleanser. I know you don’t need to do that but I like a 2 step clean. I have combo acne prone skin (adult acne) and this stuff has been amazing in getting my acne under control because of its deep clean. It takes all types of makeup off super easy without rubbing hard. Plus is has clean ingredients which is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a jar!
customer_reviews.text: Best cleanser and makeup ever! I’ve tried hundreds of traditional, organic, and all natural brands. Nothing compares to how well this cleans and removes makeup without drying out my skin or requiring minutes of scrubbing to take off stubborn mascara.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Tried this as a sample and loved the way it cleansed and removed makeup, but still left my skin feeling soft and moist. The full size does not disappoint. One of the best cleansers and makeup remover I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use to remove my eye makeup with baby oil! Not good over time. This stuff not only removes my makeup easily and quickly but its super gently too! There are other cheaper Cleansing Balms out there but treat yourself to this stuff! It's the best!! Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: RoRa1313

customer_reviews.title: Works well, feels wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love to double cleanse. I used to use straight coconut oil and loved it, but more and more people are discouraging the use of it on the face. So I switched to this cleanser. I really love it. Smells great, COMPLETELY melts away makeup. Usually I have those little mascara marks left under my eyes, but not with this! Then add just a little water and it comes right off. It's lovely. I usually follow up with a foaming cleanser, especially if I wore makeup that day. I wish the price point was around $15, but I'll still shell out for it. Came quickly and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Removes Makeup Quickly
customer_reviews.text: This product removes makeup quickly and easily. Simply apply all over your face and remove with warm water. I have used Dissolv and I prefer the scent of Farmacy. Easy to use and doesn't break out your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Makes my eyes water non stop
customer_reviews.text: This is great at removing makeup and not leaving an oily residue behind, however when I use it to remove makeup near my eyes they water for HOURS afterwards. Like borderline crying tears, they water so bad. I want to love it, but I just can't use it anymore because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Pague

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love how this makes my skin feel, however, very disappointed with its effectiveness at actually removing makeup. Clean it zero works better at actually removing your makeup. And costs less.
customer_reviews.author: MeghannAugusta

customer_reviews.title: Excellent face cleanser for waterproof makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face cleanser. Especially if you use waterproof mascara and eye liner.
customer_reviews.author: mybutterflywings

customer_reviews.title: The Green Machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this !! Received a sample from a friend and enjoyed it so much I had to buy it. Bought a similar product from a pretty big name but found it drying. This is refreshing and extremely easy and has a wonderful "slip" when removing makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Barabara K. Lott

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s very pricey but I’ve already bought this twice it’s very nice and gentle on my skin doesn’t take a lot to remove my makeup and it can remove any type of makeup with just one go around I don’t need to scrub at my eyes or face.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: This is your sign, yes. You need it
customer_reviews.text: Okay HONESTLY, this makeup remover is my life. I LOVE it. Makeup remover wipes are meh compared to this. It melts your makeup right off without any kind of struggle and a little goes a long way. It’s super gentle and hydrating too after a long day of catfishing the world. BUY IT. Thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Heard about this product from YouTuber Susan Yara and she is RIGHT to recommend this product! I really love how gently it removes make-up and leaves my face feeling clean and nourished. Highly recommend and this will become a must-have in my daily skin care routine. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I got a smaller jar in a monthly make up box and fell in love with it. It's gentle but cleans really well. It just melts away the makeup...even waterproof mascara doesn't stand a chance. It doesn't take much, which is nice. Will definitely buy over and over.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reaux

customer_reviews.title: My "deserted island product"
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it has become a permanent staple in my routine. If I could bring one skin care item with me to a deserted island, it would be this. Scent is very light, but pleasant. Leaves your skin feeling balmy and moisturized but not oily. Killer at removing eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Alexis Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased and it is used
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I ordered this and this is what showed up. It looks like this product was previously opened and used.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cleanser!!! I got a sample in my Ipsy bag and I was sold! Takes off every single bit of makeup and leaves your skin feeling amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi T

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product for cleansing and makeup removal
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this product as part of my double cleanse, because I have oily skin. It does have a scent, but it's not strong at all. Very easy to apply and wash off. It also removes makeup very well. The consistency is nice and doesn't leave your skin feeling oily. If you're looking for a product that can be used whether you wear makeup or not, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: K Coley

customer_reviews.title: Feels good,first
customer_reviews.text: Need to remind myself to use it, but when I do I like the feel of how it removes makeup and soften the skin before cleansing. I did notice two large pimples after use, though I am not convinced it new due to other skin care routine changes. I suggest trying this with normal routine to see how your skin reacts.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Box looked like it was opened
customer_reviews.text: Box came looking like it was opened, and content was melted to the side. This is my 5th purchase and was slightly disappointed by how it came. Other than that as a remover itself works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Melt off is correct
customer_reviews.text: The best makeup remover ever. It literally will take off anything, even hard set makeup that I would normally have to scrub at with a wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but thorough cleaning..
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it removes all makeup but doesn’t strip my skin.. I have always used the Dermalogica three step system however, I am now hooked on this product..
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I use to use clinique take the day off but I am now in Love with this product even more. Smells good and works even better.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I recently discovered this product at Sephora and I love the consistency of the product on my skin. It melts makeup away fast and is gentle on my sensitive skin. Love the clean fresh scent, too. Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Although I need to rub my eye more to get off my eye makeup. Until I find a better one I am deffinetly going to buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Best cleanser for removing makeup!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! It’s an all in one cleanser that removes your eye makeup as well! I feel like my face is truly clean without a trace of makeup after I use it!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: THIS QUICKLY BECAME A NEW HOLY GRAIL IN MY SKIN CLEANSING RITUAL —- NO CRAZY FRAGRANCE ODOR, EXCELLENT AT REMOVING FULL FACE OF LONG WEAR MAKEUP — NO STRIPPING — SKIN FEELS MOISTURIZED
customer_reviews.author: N Medero

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture of this but it doesn’t work at well as some other makeup balms that I have used. The smell is nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca j

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it met my expectations. I need something to wash my waterproof mascara, it does a good job doing that
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I like how it removes all the make-up off my face, especially the 18 hour eyeliner. I don't have to keep going over my face 3 or 4 times with make-up wipes, this remover dissolves the make-up right away. I have not found a make-up remover that I have purchased more than once except this one. I am loving this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chiquita

customer_reviews.title: It’s actually worth the price 100%
customer_reviews.text: A friend turned me on to this product and it’s one of the best things to ever happen to my skin. This is a game changer and part of me wants to share it with the world but another part of me wants to keep it all for myself because it’s that kind of good.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY DOES melt your makeup away!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING. It literally - just like it says - melts the makeup from your face. I have never found a product that removes makeup as quickly and effortlessly as this does. It leaves my skin feeling soft and clean, not dry. And BONUS....it smells really good. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Am in love
customer_reviews.text: It’s just soooo perfect for my combination skin. Melts out all the makeup with very lil effort. I do use a face wash after when I do a lot makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Don’t ever wash with anything else
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! I use just a little at a time because I’m afraid of running out. It’s easy on your eyes too.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Smells yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Mostly for the scent. The scent reminds me of slushies. Also, it has a nice texture. A little goes a long way. Works well to remove makeup and sunscreen. Doesn't irritate the skin or eyes. I have oily, acne prone skin and I haven't had an problems with it
customer_reviews.author: Terra Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good for makeup removal but caused breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this because I love this brand but it made me breakout really bad. I may have been using it wrong. It definitely melts your makeup though.
customer_reviews.author: Kg

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: Great makeup remover. Takes off waterproof mascara easily. Non drying and doesn’t irritate eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 debt makers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this balm. I apply the a VERY small amount to my face and remove my makeup with a Green Estate makeup pad. The scent is fresh and non-chemical. If it gets in your eyes, it doesn’t sting or burn. I am so glad that not only do I not have to worry about buying makeup wipes all the time, but I no longer have to pollute the planet. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lentini

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It takes off all my makeup so that my cleanser can clean my skin. Same concept as picking up stuff from the floor so you can vacuum. Now my skin actually gets clean which then helps make my other products more effective! Buy this. Your skin will thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Ally C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. You need only a small amount to thoroughly cleanse and remove makeup, rinses away easily. Also, it doesn't sting if you accidentally get it in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Ripple

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. Highly recommend. It seems very high quality from the packaging, smell, and consistency. Most importantly, it works very well. It does leave your face oily, but that’s easily fixed with a quick wipe with a cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great gentle makeup remover!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of people use this product and decided to try it and I really like it! The scent is very nice, it’s gentle and I like how it melts on your skin. It does not leave your skin oily but rather smooth and clean. My eyes don’t really like the product for some reason so I used a different product to remote my eye makeup but over all I am enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: Goes on very smoothly, not greasy, and has a fresh clean scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kaeleen Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Deep cleans !
customer_reviews.text: My fav make up face cleanser of all time. Really removes make up well even mascara. Does not sting and does not dry out skin. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great makeup remover. I even use it to clean my face when I’m not wearing makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Sinaed Graves

customer_reviews.title: Best face cleanser I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Great makeup remover and leaves skin feeling so soft. I would not want to be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cant love this product enough. Of you're on the fence dont be buy it and thank me later
customer_reviews.author: MrsKoballaRiley

customer_reviews.title: makes my eyes sting
customer_reviews.text: I have used this and am so disappointed. My eyes sting a little while after using it. It was a slow build up and now it's past the return window. I will be throwing out the jar -- nothing is worth uncomfortable eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Beaty

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but the best makeup remover I've ever tried! Will reorder! A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: LOVEEEEEE this stuff. It takes off all of my make-up and feels so nice! Even though it’s expensive, I don’t use a lot. It doesn’t dry out my face or anything. Instead, I feel like it provides moisture! Love, love, love.
customer_reviews.author: Lynore L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cleansing balm I will use! Best one on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I was looking for a cheaper alternative to Eve Lom’s cleanser. I love the scent and the feel of this and so far it has been great for my skin. I have rosacea so I need something super gentle and moisturizing and this hasn’t made my skin flare up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ambika

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand and the remover works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This is really good at removing make up. The scent is a little strong. It smells like the Blue Magic Bergamot hair conditioner. I don’t really recommend this for people with acne prone skin though.
customer_reviews.author: Capri Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the splurge
customer_reviews.text: This is worth the splurge. It cleans off makeup without a greasy residue and even works well waterproof makeup. Also, a little bit really goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hsu

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but overpriced. There are other Korean brand with same effect but much cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: LoveShopping

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best makeup remover I have ever used. I have very sensitive skin and it does not irritate it. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Staber

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I am highly allergic my eyes swelled up and turned red and itchy
customer_reviews.author: Filomena Liquori

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is first time trying this product I was so surprised how easy this remover can remove all the makeup stuff from my face I’ll buy again for the next time
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Melts your makeup off! In a good way!
customer_reviews.text: Takes off the toughest makeup. It all melts away and has a nice citrus smell.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love love this product!! It removes make up like a dream! I 1st got introduced to it on a monthly subscription box! It is pricey but totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup remover I've ever used. Seems a little pricey but you really need a tiny amount every time. I've had it a month or so and have barely made a dent.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite remover
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup remover! Just a bit will melt off all your makeup! Even pigmented eyeshadow, lip stains, or touch lipstick! Good to clean glue off strip lashes too!
customer_reviews.author: Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Best eye make up remover I’ve ever used I got it originally and a Boxycharm box. After I ran out I had to have more
customer_reviews.author: Mya Caron

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It lasts forever because you only need to use a little each time. The scent is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin. Does a good job of getting makeup off.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Takes only seconds
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It literally removes all of my makeup in seconds and washes off easily. Nothing else beats this product. The best I’ve ever used thus far.
customer_reviews.author: catherine miller

customer_reviews.title: Natural but luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Easy make up remover and cleanser is magic, leaves face feeling clean but not tight. It’s very gentle. Next time I will purchase the larger jar.
customer_reviews.author: Arjay

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it I was afraid it was going to be greasy it was not it is amazing my skin feels amazing and it smells wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: linda mossi

product_meta.title: Farmacy Natural Makeup Remover - Green Clean Makeup Meltaway Cleansing Balm Cosmetic
feature_bullets: THE FARMACY WAY: Our goal is simple. We want to bring out the best version of your radiant self with the best possible, naturally derived ingredients. Each skincare and beauty product we craft uses cutting-edge science to harness the healing powers of ingredients that Mother Nature has been so kind as to provide for us.

MELT THAT MAKEUP: Sunflower and ginger root oils gently remove even the toughest long-wear makeup without stripping or drying, leaving skin hydrated and silky smooth. All-natural Moringa extract lifts away impurities from pollution so your skin stays younger, longer.
NATURAL EXFOLIATION: Natural enzymes found in papayas exfoliate and provide you with a wonderful, healthy glow — no makeup required.

ONLY THE BEST: The eye & face makeup cleaner for women is created from only naturally derived ingredients including Moringa Tree extract and Echinacea GreenEnvy. It's also free of parabens, sulfates, artificial coloring and is not tested on animals.

HOW TO USE: Scoop a generous amount with the included spatula, and use your fingertips to massage into skin with gentle upward and outward circular motions. The solid balm will melt into an oil on contact with skin, then a milky lather when water is applied. Splash with water or wipe off with a warm, damp washcloth.
